summary: An FBI email from October 8, 2019, documenting contact with Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, who inquired about the autopsy results and wanted to speak with the case agent. The email includes Mark Epstein's contact information and a brief summary of the conversation.

persons.name: Mark Lawrence Epstein
persons.role: Brother of Jeffrey Epstein, contacted by FBI
persons.context: He was contacted by FBI agents at 26 Federal Plaza lobby, inquiring about his brother's autopsy report and wanting to speak with the case agent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: His brother Mark Epstein is inquiring about the results of his autopsy report, which shows as pending regarding suicide or murder.

persons.name: Det. M
persons.role: FBI Detective, partner of the email author
persons.context: Partner of the email author who made contact with Mark Epstein at 26 Federal Plaza lobby.

connections.description: Mark Epstein is the brother of Jeffrey Epstein, as stated in the document.
Det. M and the email author made contact with Mark Epstein at 26 Federal Plaza lobby.

events.title: FBI contact with Mark Epstein
events.description: FBI agents made contact with Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, at 26 Federal Plaza lobby. Mark Epstein inquired about the autopsy results and wanted to speak with the case agent.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's death and autopsy
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died in August 2019, and his autopsy report was pending, with confusion over whether it was suicide or murder, as mentioned by Mark Epstein.

locations: 26 Federal Plaza lobby, New York, NY
keyFacts: Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, was contacted by FBI agents on October 8, 2019, at 26 Federal Plaza in New York.
Mark Epstein inquired about the results of his brother's autopsy report, expressing confusion because the death certificate/report showed as pending regarding suicide or murder.
Mark Epstein requested the name and contact information of the case agent and wanted to speak with them immediately.
The document provides Mark Epstein's contact information, including his Florida address and phone number.
